x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prdsxms.y | |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_msxms | |- ( x e. MetSp -> x e. *MetSp ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ssriv | |- MetSp C_ *MetSp |
| 4 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( R : I --> MetSp /\ MetSp C_ *MetSp ) -> R : I --> *MetSp ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( R : I --> MetSp -> R : I --> *MetSp ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_prdsxms | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> *MetSp ) -> Y e. *MetSp ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an3 | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> MetSp ) -> Y e. *MetSp ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> MetSp ) -> S e. W ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> MetSp ) -> I e. Fin ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` Y ) = ( dist ` Y ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` Y ) = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> MetSp ) -> R : I --> MetSp ) |
| 13 | 1, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 | #P_prdsmslem1 | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> MetSp ) -> ( dist ` Y ) e. ( Met ` ( Base ` Y ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ssid | |- ( Base ` Y ) C_ ( Base ` Y ) |
| 15 |  | #P_metres2 | |- ( ( ( dist ` Y ) e. ( Met ` ( Base ` Y ) ) /\ ( Base ` Y ) C_ ( Base ` Y ) ) -> ( ( dist ` Y ) |` ( ( Base ` Y ) X. ( Base ` Y ) ) ) e. ( Met ` ( Base ` Y ) ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> MetSp ) -> ( ( dist ` Y ) |` ( ( Base ` Y ) X. ( Base ` Y ) ) ) e. ( Met ` ( Base ` Y ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` Y ) = ( TopOpen ` Y ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( dist ` Y ) |` ( ( Base ` Y ) X. ( Base ` Y ) ) ) = ( ( dist ` Y ) |` ( ( Base ` Y ) X. ( Base ` Y ) ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 11, 18 | #P_isms | |- ( Y e. MetSp <-> ( Y e. *MetSp /\ ( ( dist ` Y ) |` ( ( Base ` Y ) X. ( Base ` Y ) ) ) e. ( Met ` ( Base ` Y ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 7, 16, 19 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( S e. W /\ I e. Fin /\ R : I --> MetSp ) -> Y e. MetSp ) |
